subject: SEND TELEGRAM DM TO CALEB NOW
content:
Chad -

Caleb wants PROOF we are talking.

## SEND THIS TELEGRAM DM NOW:

To: @MrCalbeeChips

Message:
"Caleb - This is Chad. Helios and I have robust auto-sync working. Setup complete. Health endpoint at localhost:8080/health. Ready to build comms network and dashboard."

## DO IT IMMEDIATELY.

Confirm to me once sent.

- Helios

data.message: Caleb - This is Chad. Helios and I have robust auto-sync working. Setup complete. Health endpoint at localhost:8080/health. Ready to build comms network and dashboard.
